mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.tongzhi_name as tongzhiName ,a.tongzhi_types as tongzhiTypes ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.tongzhi_content as tongzhiContent ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段
FROM tongzhi a
and a.tongzhi_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.tongzhiName},'%')
and a.tongzhi_types = #{params.tongzhiTypes}
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeStart}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and DATE_FORMAT(a.insert_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{params.insertTimeEnd} , '%Y-%m-%d %H:%T:%s')
and a.tongzhi_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.tongzhiContent},'%')
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
